events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision on the highway involving their sedan and a truck, requesting immediate claim processing.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' following review of the initial accident description and damage reports.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and to act as the primary contact.
The claim has been acknowledged officially, and the customer was informed promptly about the next steps involved.
Requested the customer to submit vehicle repair estimates, police accident report, and photos of damages for further processing.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including a detailed repair estimate and official accident report.
Investigation has commenced with the assigned specialist reviewing submitted documents and vehicle damage details.
The investigation concluded that fault is clearly assignable and the damages are consistent with the reported collision.
A settlement offer covering full vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the offer and timely communication.
The claim was officially approved after confirmation of all documents and settlement agreement acceptance by the customer.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and transferred to the customer's designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed after confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction.
All files and documents related to the closed auto accident claim have been archived securely for record keeping.
